comment: No midterm or final. All of the work is on bearface, you read and take a quiz at the end of each module. You are allowed three absences until he starts deducting points from your grade. He's really cool and funny and the work is easy.

Modules due about every other week. Assignments are all online, but he does take attendance. You do have to pay to access your homework, about $80 if I remember correctly. Easy A if you keep up with the modules. Very cool veteran who knows what he's talking about.

he is a boomer and does say some pretty cliche things but the class is fun and he is very engaging during lectures. Attendance is mandatory but all assignments are online and the tests are open note. You will have to submit a handful of self-health reports throughout the year though. Easy A as long as you pace yourself and attend class

I really enjoyed this class!!! there is homework but most of it is just online reading and the major project! test/quizzes are NO lockdown browser! lectures are actually engaging! He has guest speakers sometimes and the class is honestly an easy A!
